name: Arcane Vendetta
text: The mistreatment of your people by an arcane society (such as Numeria’s Technic League or the White Witches of Irrisen) has made you particularly eager to inflict harm on those who use arcane magic.
benefit: You deal +2 damage with weapon attacks made against any target you have witnessed casting an arcane spell (not using a spell-like ability) in the last 5 rounds. You must have successfully identified the spell with a Spellcraft check to know without a doubt that the spell is arcane.
text_zh: 曾经有奥术团体的成员（诸如纽梅利亚[Numeria]的科技联盟[Technic League]，或者伊利森[Irrisen]的白女巫[White Witches]）虐待过你，这使得你极端希望把伤害加诸到那些使用奥术的人身上。
benefit_zh: 在对抗任何5轮之内施放过奥术（而非使用类法术能力）的目标时，你的武器攻击造成的伤害提高2点。在这之前你必须成功使用法术辨识技能鉴别法术，用以确信目标所施放的确实是奥术。
